name: Pinsir
description: The Stag Beetle Pokémon. Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can’t move if it’s cold out, so it lives in warm places.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s attack or damage bonuses cannot be decreased by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon may immediately take another action.
